summary: This mod changes the default race heights for Skyrim, which affects NPCs and the Player.
descriptionHtml: This mod changes the default race heights for Skyrim, which affects NPCs and the Player. It changes the heights of all female races (except Kajiit and Breton) and Child races as well. It makes the females slightly shorter than before, and the child races' heights are edited to make them different in height, rather than having them all be the same height.
author: Wareagle545
